# cancellationFee

**Instance Property**

The cancellation fee charged by your service.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var cancellationFee: INCurrencyAmount? { get set }
```

## Discussion

SiriKit communicates your cancellation fee to the user as part of the confirmation process. Specify a value for the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelRideIntentResponse/cancellationFeeThreshold] property if cancellation fees apply only after a period of time has elapsed.

## Specifying Cancellation Fees

- **cancellationFeeThreshold**: The amount of time that must elapse before cancellation fees apply.

items.description: The amount of time that must elapse before cancellation fees apply.
